THE CAUSE OF DERAILMENT IS STILL UNDER INVESTIGATION, A REPORT WILL FOLLOW WHEN THE INVESTIGATION IS COMPLETED AND THE CAUSE OF THE DERAILMENT IS DETERMINERMINED. WHEN THE DRIVER OF THE TRACTOR-TRAILER SAW THE DERAILED RAILROAD CARS ON THE BRIDGE AND SOME DEBRIS FALLING FROM THE BRIDGE, HE APPLIED HIS BRAKES AND SWERVED. THE TRACTOR STRUCK THE GUARD RAIL, DAMAGING THE VEHICLE.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone
